title: List of tropical storms named Koppu
text:
The name Koppu has been used for three <a href="tropical%20cyclone">tropical cyclone</a>s in the northwestern Pacific Ocean. The name was contributed by <a href="Japan">Japan</a>, and means '<a href="Crater%20%28constellation%29">cup</a>'.
The name "Koppu" was retired by the WMO Typhoon Committee in 2016 and was replaced with the name "<a href="Tropical%20Storm%20Koguma">Koguma</a>" for the 2021 Typhoon season.
